　-与えたBRVダメージに応じて味方全員のHP中回復

　-味方全員に自身の現在HPに依存した量のBRVを加算

　　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
・通常「HP攻撃」「HP攻撃＋」が

　-奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分

　　自身以外の味方全員に加算

　　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分

・通常「HP攻撃」「HP攻撃＋」

　　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
　-ターゲット以外にも50％分のHPダメージ

desc.en:
When using [Rising Phantom], [Rising Phantom+]
• Increases stolen BRV overflow limit by 30%

When using [Rising Phantom]
• 4-HIT AoE melee BRV attack + AoE HP attack
• Increases total BRV potency by 110%

When using [Rising Phantom+]
• 4-HIT AoE melee BRV attack + AoE HP attack delivered twice
• Increases total BRV potency by 220%

When special effect [Spectral Charge] is at 5 levels
• [Rising Phantom+] becomes [Rising Phantom++]
　∟ All enemies: Inflicts BREAK (cancels BREAK status if already broken)
　∟ 4-HIT AoE melee BRV attack + AoE HP attack delivered 3 times
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 320% compared to [Rising Phantom+]
　∟ Does not consume use count on next turn (excl. some abilities)

While [Spectral Charge] is active
• [BRV Attack], [BRV Attack+] become [BRV Attack++]
　∟ 3-HIT melee BRV attack (70% per hit)
　∟ Increases own BRV by 10% of Max BRV when inflicting BREAK
• [HP Attack], [HP Attack+] become [HP Attack++]
　∟ 3-HIT melee BRV attack + HP attack (60% per hit)
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
　∟ Increases own BRV by 10% of Max BRV after HP attack when inflicting BREAK
　∟ Triggers follow-up attack when [Spectral Charge] is at least 3 levels
desc.gl:
When using Rising Phantom, Rising Phantom+:
 • 3-hit group melee BRV attack + group HP attack becomes 4-hit group melee BRV attack + group HP attack; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage

With 5 levels of Spectral Charge:
 • Rising Phantom+ becomes Rising Phantom++ (inflicts Break on all enemies before BRV attack; cancels Break and inflicts Break if target afflicted with Break; 4-hit group melee BRV attack + group HP attack delivered 2 times becomes 4-hit group melee BRV attack + group HP attack delivered 3 times; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage; next turn after use does not consume ability use count [some abilities excluded])

While Spectral Charge active:
 • BRV Attack, BRV Attack+ become BRV Attack++ (3-hit melee BRV attack + HP Attack; increases BRV based on MAX BRV if target afflicted with Break)
 • HP Attack, HP Attack+ become HP Attack++ (3-hit melee BRV attack + HP Attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%; increases BRV based on MAX BRV if target afflicted with Break; triggers additional attack with at least 3 levels of Spectral Charge active)

desc.en:
When using [Laser Lance]
• Increases number of BRV hits by 6
• Increases total BRV potency by 390%
• Increases own BRV based on 20% of HP damage dealt after 1st and 2nd HP attacks

While [Wild Lancer] is active
• [BRV Attack], [Jump] become [Jump+]
　∟ Increases party's BRV by 70% of Attack before BRV attacks
　∟ 4-HIT AoE ranged BRV attack (50% per hit)
　∟ Increases BRV damage dealt by 60% when attacking single target
　∟ Lowers Action Delay to 20
• [HP Attack], [High Jump] become [High Jump+]
　∟ 3-HIT AoE ranged BRV attack + ST HP attack (40% per hit)
　∟ Increases BRV damage dealt by 60% when attacking single target
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
　∟ Deals 20% HP damage to non-targets
desc.gl:
When using Laser Lance:
 • Total BRV attack hit count increased by 6; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Increases BRV by 20% of cumulative HP damage dealt after each HP attack (excluding last HP attack)
 
While Wild Lancer active:
 • BRV Attack, Jump become Jump+ (grants party BRV based on own ATK: 4-hit group ranged BRV attack; moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target; high turn rate)
 • HP Attack, High Jump become High Jump+ (3-hit group ranged BRV attack + single-target HP attack; moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; deals 20% HP damage to non-targets)

While Selkie Soul, At the Ready active:
 • BRV Attack, BRV Attack+ becomes BRV Attack++ (BRV attack hit count becomes 3; slight cumulative BRV damage boost over BRV Attack+; grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV)
 • HP Attack, HP Attack+ becomes HP Attack++ (grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV before attack; becomes 2-hit ranged BRV attack + HP attack; moderate cumulative BRV damage boost over HP Attack+; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%)
 • Chain-attack BRV Attack, Selkie Chase (BRV) becomes Selkie Chase+ (BRV) (reduces BRV of targets not afflicted with Break to 0; grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV; target: 6 turns Fitted Enfeeblement)
 • Chain-attack HP Attack, Selkie Chase (HP) becomes Selkie Chase+ (HP) (grants party BRV based on individual MAX BRV; HP attack; increased BRV may exceed individual MAX BRV up to 120%; target: 6 turns Fitted Enfeeblement)

desc.en:

• Increases BRV potency by 80%
• [Sworn General] effects +20%
• [Thunder Slash] use +1 after use (up to initial value)

When party has 12 or more buffs:
• [Climhazzard+] becomes [Climhazzard++]
　∟ 8-HIT AoE magic BRV + HP attack delivered twice
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 80%
　∟ Raises BRV by 30% of HP damage dealt after first HP attack
• [BRV Attack], [BRV Attack+], [BRV Attack++] become [BRV Attack+++]
　∟ Magic BRV attack
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 4

　∟ Party's gained BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
• Turns [HP Attack], [HP Attack+], [HP Attack++] become [HP Attack+++]
　∟ 3-HIT magic BRV attack + HP attack
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 80% compared to [HP Attack++]
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
　∟ Converts 20% of HP damage dealt to party BRV

 • Large BRV damage boost
 • Slight Sworn General effect boost
 • Thunder Slash use +1 after use (with upper limit)

When party has 12 or more buffs:
 • Climhazzard+ becomes Climhazzard++ (8-hit group magic BRV attack + group HP attack delivered 2 times; largely increased cumulative BRV damage; increases BRV by 30% of HP damage dealt after first HP attack)
 • BRV Attack, BRV Attack+, BRV Attack++ becomes BRV Attack+++ (magic BRV attack; BRV attack hit count becomes 4; slight cumulative BRV damage boost over BRV Attack++; grants party BRV based on own ATK; increased BRV may exceed individual MAX BRV up to 120%)
 • HP Attack, HP Attack+, HP Attack++ becomes HP Attack+++ (3-hit magic BRV attack + HP attack; large cumulative BRV damage boost over HP Attack++; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; grants party BRV based on HP damage dealt)

name.en: True Demon Slice BRV HP Hit Plus Force++
name.gl: Demon Slice X BRV HP Hit Plus Force++
name.jp: 真・鬼斬りBRVHPヒットプラスフォース＋＋

desc.en:
When using 「True Demon Slice」:
- Becomes a 5-HIT AoE ranged BRV Attack + ST HP Attack triggered twice
- Tremendously raises total BRV potency

When 「Sorceress's Knight」 and 「Young Revolutionary」 are active:
- Turns 「BRV Attack」 and 「BRV Attack+」 into 「BRV Attack++」
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 3
　∟ Slightly increases total BRV potency when compared to 「BRV Attack+」
- Turns 「HP Attack」 and 「HP Attack+」 into 「HP Attack++」
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Moderately raises total BRV potency
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
desc.gl:
When using Demon Slice X:
 • 6-hit group ranged BRV attack + single-target HP attack becomes 5-hit group ranged BRV attack + single-target HP attack delivered 2 times; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage

While Sorceress's Knight, Young Revolutionary active: 
 • BRV Attack, BRV Attack+ becomes BRV Attack++ (3-hit group ranged BRV attack; slight cumulative BRV damage boost over BRV Attack+; moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target; deals extra BRV damage to debuffed targets)
 • HP Attack, HP Attack+ becomes HP Attack++ (2-hit group ranged BRV attack + group HP attack; moderate cumulative BRV damage boost over HP Attack+; moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target; deals extra BRV damage to debuffed targets; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%; deals proportionate HP damage to each target)
desc.jp:
「真・鬼斬り」使用時
6HIT全体遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋単体HP攻撃が
5HIT全体遠距離物理BRV攻撃
＋単体HP攻撃を2回行うに変化し
合計BRV威力も極大アップ

「魔女の騎士」「若き革命家」付与中
・通常「BRV攻撃」「BRV攻撃＋」が「BRV攻撃＋＋」に変化し
　-3HIT全体遠距離物理BRV攻撃に変化し
　　「BRV攻撃＋」よりも合計BRV威力も小アップ
　-攻撃対象が単体の時 与えるBRVダメージ中アップ
　-弱体効果が付与された対象に より大きなBRVダメージ
・通常「HP攻撃」「HP攻撃＋」が「HP攻撃＋＋」に変化し
　-2HIT全体遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃に変化し
　　「HP攻撃＋」よりも合計BRV威力も中アップ
　-攻撃対象が単体の時 与えるBRVダメージ中アップ
　-弱体効果が付与された対象により大きなBRVダメージ
　-奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
　-与えるHPダメージは分配

desc.en:
When Quest starts:
- Grants 「Fervent Hero」 for 6 turns
- Does not consume ability use on the first turn

When 「Fervent Hero」 is active:
- Turns 「BRV Attack」 and 「BRV Attack+」 into 「BRV Attack++」
　∟ 2-HIT melee BRV attack
　∟ Raises party BRV based on Initial BRV
- Turns 「HP Attack」 and 「HP Attack+」 into 「HP Attack++」
　∟ Raises BRV based on Max BRV before attacking
　∟ Melee BRV + HP attack
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
　∟ Raises BRV based on 20% of HP damage dealt
desc.gl:
At start of quest:
 • Self: 6 turns Hotblooded Hero
 • First turn does not consume use count (some abilities excluded)

While Hotblooded Hero active:
 • BRV Attack, BRV Attack+ becomes BRV Attack++ (slight BRV damage boost; slightly increased BRV based on INT BRV)
 • HP Attack, HP Attack+ becomes HP Attack++ (marginally increased BRV based on MAX BRV; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; slightly increased BRV based on HP damage dealt)

desc.en:
When using Bhavacakra:
• 4-HIT magic BRV attack + HP attack delivered twice
• Tremendously raises total BRV potency
• Raises BRV by 50% of HP damage dealt after first HP Attack
• Raises Max BRV overflow limit of stolen BRV to 180%
• Deals 20% of total HP damage to non-targets on final HP Attack

When using Bhavacakra+:
• 8-HIT magic BRV attack + HP attack delivered twice
• Tremendously raises total BRV potency
• Raises BRV by 50% of HP damage dealt after first HP Attack
• Raises Max BRV overflow limit of stolen BRV to 230%
• Deals 20% of total HP damage to non-targets on final HP Attack

BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack++:
• 3-HIT melee BRV Attack
• Greatly raises BRV damage dealt to targets afflicted by Poison and Intense Poison
• Inflicts Poison for 4 turns

BRV Attack+ (Ninki) becomes BRV Attack++ (Ninki):
• 3-HIT melee BRV Attack
• Greatly raises BRV damage dealt to targets afflicted by Poison and Intense Poison
• Consumes 3 Ninki
• Inflicts Poison for 4 turns
• No Action Delay
• Does not increase turn count
• Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
• Doesn't consume ability uses on the next turn (excl. certain abilities)

HP Attack and HP Attack+ becomes HP Attack++:
• 3-HIT melee BRV Attack + HP Attack
• Greatly raises BRV damage dealt to targets afflicted by Poison and Intense Poison
• BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
• Inflicts Poison for 6 turns

name.jp: レクイエムフォースチェイン

desc.en:
When using 「Requiem」:
- Moderately raises BRV potency
- If target is below 80% Max HP, triggers the following attack
　∟ 4-HIT magic BRV + HP attack
　∟ Greater BRV Damage to debuffed targets
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
　∟ Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
- Furthermore, if the target is below 30% Max HP, triggers the following attack
　∟ Raises BRV based on Attack, followed by 2-HIT magic BRV + HP Attack executed twice
　∟ Greater BRV Damage to debuffed targets
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
desc.gl:
When using Requiem:
 • Moderate BRV damage boost
 • Triggers following action if target's HP 80% of MAX HP or less after use:
 • 4-hit magic BRV attack + HP attack
 • Deals extra BRV damage to debuffed targets
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
 • Further triggers following action if target's HP 30% of MAX HP or less:
 • Increases BRV based on ATK
 • 2-hit magic BRV attack + HP attack delivered 2 times
 • Deals extra BRV damage to debuffed targets
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
desc.jp:
「レクイエム」使用時
・BRV威力中アップ
・使用後 ターゲットのHPが最大HPの80％以下の時
　以下の行動が追加発動
　-4HIT魔法BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
　-弱体効果が付与された対象に より大きなBRVダメージ
　-奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
　-ターゲット以外にも50％分のHPダメージ
・さらに ターゲットのHPが最大HPの30％以下の時
　以下の行動が追加発動
　-自身に自身の攻撃力に依存した量のBRVを加算後
　　2HIT魔法BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃を2回行う
　-弱体効果が付与された対象に より大きなBRVダメージ
　-奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分

• [HP Attack＋] becomes [HP Attack++]

 • BRV Attack, BRV Attack+ become BRV Attack++ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; slight cumulative BRV damage boost over BRV Attack+; grants party BRV based on own ATK; slightly restores own HP based on BRV damage dealt; recovery limit: 5% of own MAX HP)
 • HP Attack, HP Attack+ become HP Attack++ (increases BRV based on ATK before HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; slightly restores own HP based on HP damage dealt; recovery limit: 5% of own MAX HP)

desc.en:
When using 「Twin Wing Frenzy」:
- BRV attack hit count becomes 8
- Tremendously increases total BRV potency
- Slightly raises Max BRV overflow limit

When 「Wife's Encouragement」 is active:

desc.en:
When using [Tornado Kick], [Tornado Kick+]
• Becomes 6-HIT AoE melee BRV + HP attack
　+ 6-HIT melee BRV + HP attack
• Increases total BRV potency of [Tornado Kick] by 60%
• Increases total BRV potency of [Tornado Kick+] by 120%
• Deals 20% of HP damage to non-targets

While buffed
• [BRV Attack], [BRV Attack+] become [BRV Attack++]
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 6
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 30% compared to [BRV Attack+]
　∟ Guaranteed critical hit when attacking enemy not targeting self
　∟ Lowers Action Delay by 6
　∟ Grants additional turn when inflicting BREAK
　　* Inflicting BREAK during additional turn will not grant another
　　* Additional turn does not increase turn count; does consume turn during summon, support
　∟ [Snap Punch] becomes [Snap Punch+] after use
• [HP Attack], [HP Attack+] become [HP Attack++]
　∟ Increases own BRV by 70% of Attack before attack
　∟ 2-HIT melee BRV attack + HP attack
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 40% compared to [HP Attack+]
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
　∟ Guaranteed critical hit when attacking enemy not targeting self
　∟ Lowers Action Delay by 6
　∟ Grants additional turn when inflicting BREAK
　　* Inflicting BREAK during additional turn will not grant another
　　* Additional turn does not increase turn count; does consume turn during summon, support
　∟ [Snap Punch] becomes [Snap Punch+] after use
desc.gl:
When using Tornado Kick, Tornado Kick+:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 6 before and after first HP attack; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Deals 20% HP damage to non-targets

With active buff:
 • BRV Attack, BRV Attack+ becomes BRV Attack ++ (BRV attack hit count becomes 6; slight cumulative BRV damage boost over BRV Attack+; becomes critical hit when attacking enemy not targeting self; high turn rate; inflicting Break grants additional turn; inflicting Break during additional turn does not grant another; additional turn does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning, support; while equipping Snap Punch Extension, Snap Punch becomes Snap Punch+ after use)
 • HP Attack, HP Attack+ becomes HP Attack++ (2-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack; moderate cumulative BRV damage boost over HP Attack+; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; becomes critical hit when attacking enemy not targeting self; high turn rate; inflicting Break grants additional turn; inflicting Break during additional turn does not grant another; additional turn does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning, support; while equipping Snap Punch Extension, Snap Punch becomes Snap Punch+ after use)

　-パッシブ「崩拳エクステンド」装備時

name.jp: ダークカノンBRVHPヒットプラスフォーススプレッドアップ＋＋

desc.en:
When using [Dark Cannon]
• Becomes a 6-HIT Dark ranged BRV attack + HP attack delivered twice
• Increases total BRV potency by 300%
• Deals 20% HP damage to non-targets on first HP attack
• Deals 20% of total HP damage dealt to target, to non-targets on second HP attack
• Enables [Darkness+], [Valiant Blow+] for 1 use regardless of HP
* Requires relevant Extend passives

While both [Power of Darkness] and [Light within Darkness] are active and HP is at least 50% of MAX
• [BRV Attack] and variants become [BRV Attack++ (Power)]
　∟ 4-HIT Dark melee BRV attack (70% per hit)
　∟ Consumes 20% of own HP
• [HP Attack] and variants become [HP Attack++ (Power)]
　∟ 3-HIT Dark melee BRV attack + HP attack (70% per hit)
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
　∟ Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
　∟ Consumes 20% of own HP

While [Power of Darkness] and [Light within Darkness] are active, and HP is less than 50% of MAX
• [BRV Attack] and variants become [BRV Attack++ (Heal)]
　∟ 3-HIT Dark melee BRV attack (70% per hit)
　∟ Recovers own HP by 20% of damage dealt (limit 20% of Max HP)
• [HP Attack] and variants become [HP Attack++ (Heal)]
　∟ 2-HIT Dark melee BRV attack + HP attack (80% per hit)
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
　∟ Recovers own HP by 50% of damage dealt (limit 30% of Max HP)
desc.gl:
When using Dark Cannon:
 • 6-hit Dark ranged BRV attack + HP attack becomes 6-hit Dark ranged BRV attack + HP attack delivered 2 times; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • First HP attack deals 20% HP damage to non-targets; second HP attack deals 20% of cumulative HP damage dealt to target to non-targets

Enables Darkness+ after use while Darkness Extension equipped
Enables Valiant Blow+ after use while Valiant Blow Extension equipped
Darkness+, Valiant Blow+ remain enabled until used

While Power of Darkness, Light within Darkness active and HP at least 50% of MAX:
 • BRV Attack/+/++ becomes BRV Attack++ (Power) (4-hit Dark melee BRV attack; slightly consumes HP upon use)
 • HP Attack/+/++ becomes HP Attack++ (Power) (3-hit Dark melee BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; deals 50% HP damage to non-targets; slightly consumes HP upon use)

While Power of Darkness, Light within Darkness active and HP less than 50% of MAX:
 • BRV Attack/+/++ becomes BRV Attack++ (Heal) (3-hit Dark melee BRV attack; slightly restores own HP based on BRV damage dealt; recovery limit: 20% of own MAX HP)
 • HP Attack/+/++ becomes HP Attack++ (Heal) (2-hit Dark melee BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; moderately restores own HP based on HP damage dealt; recovery limit: 30% of own MAX HP)

desc.en:
When using 「Booster 8」, 「Booster 8+」:
- Moderately raises BRV potency
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
- Inflicts 「Thief's Mark」 for 5 turns

After using 「Booster 8」, 「Booster 8+」:
- 「BRV Attack」, 「BRV Attack+」 become 「Mug」:
　∟ Reduces target's BRV by 1/2
　∟ Raises own BRV based on reduced BRV
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 3
　∟ Greater BRV damage to targets afflicted with 「Thief's Mark」
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
　∟ Deals HP damage based on current BRV
　∟ Does not consume current BRV upon dealing HP damage
　∟ Extends duration of existing buffs by 1 turn
　∟ No action delay
　∟ Does not increase turn count
　∟ Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
　∟ Reverts to 「BRV Attack+」 or 「BRV Attack++」 based on conditions
　∟ Else, reverts to 「BRV Attack」

While 「Thievery」 is active:
- 「Booster 8」 becomes 「Booster 8+」:
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 4
　∟ Greatly raises total BRV potency
　∟ Greater BRV damage to targets afflicted with 「Thief's Mark」
　∟ Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
　∟ Inflicts 「Thief's Mark」 on all enemies
desc.gl:
When using Booster 8, Booster 8+:
 • Moderate BRV damage boost
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Target: 5 turns Thief's Mark
 • BRV Attack, BRV Attack+, BRV Attack++ becomes Mug (reduces target's BRV to 1/2 before attack, then gain BRV based on BRV reduced; BRV attack hit count becomes 3; deals extra BRV damage to targets afflicted with Thief's Mark; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; deals HP damage based on current BRV; does not expend own BRV; extends buffs by 1 turn; instant turn rate; does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning, support; returns to BRV Attack+, BRV Attack++ after use if conditions to become BRV Attack+, BRV Attack++ are met; returns to BRV Attack if not)

While Thievery active: 
 • Booster 8 becomes Booster 8+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 4; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage; deals extra BRV damage to targets afflicted with Thief's Mark; deals 50% HP damage to non-targets; Thief's Mark debuff infliction extended to all enemies)
desc.jp:

・BRV威力中アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
・対象に5ACTION「盗みのあかし」付与
・使用後 通常「BRV攻撃」「BRV攻撃＋」「BRV攻撃＋＋」
　が「ぶんどる」に変化し
　-攻撃前に対象のBRVを1/2にした後
　　減らしたBRVに依存した量のBRVを自身に加算
　-BRV攻撃のHIT数が3HITに変化
　-「盗みのあかし」の弱体効果が付与された対象に
　　より大きなBRVダメージ
　-奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
　-自身の現在BRVに依存した量のHPダメージを与える
　　自身のBRVは消費しない
　-自身に付与された強化効果を1ACTION延長する
　-行動負荷がない
　-総ACTION数に加算されない
　　召喚中およびフレンドサポートの残りACTIONは消費される
　-使用後「BRV攻撃＋」「BRV攻撃＋＋」
　　への変化条件を満たしている場合は
　　「BRV攻撃＋」「BRV攻撃＋＋」に
　　そうでない場合は通常「BRV攻撃」に戻る

「盗賊のあかし」付与中
「ブースター8」が「ブースター8＋」に変化し

desc.en:
When [Bearer of Hope] is active:
•  [BRV Attack], [BRV Attack+] become [Brutal Sanction]
　∟ 4-HIT AoE magic BRV attack (40% per hit)
　∟ Increases BRV damage dealt by 60% when attacking single target
　∟ Increases party's BRV by 70% of Attack
• [HP Attack], [HP Attack+] become [Retributive Blast]
　∟ 4-HIT magic BRV + HP attack (80% per hit)
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
　∟ Deals 20% HP damage to non-targets
　∟ Target: 4 turns 40% [DEF Down] when breaking target or attacking broken target
desc.gl: When special effect Entrusted Hope at least 1:\n • BRV Attack, BRV Attack+ becomes Brutal Sanction (4-hit group magic BRV attack; moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target; grants party BRV based on own ATK)\n • HP Attack, HP Attack+ becomes Retributive Blast (4-hit magic BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; deals 20% HP damage to non-targets; inflicts 4 turns DEF Down II on target when inflicting Break on target or attacking target afflicted with Break)

　-攻撃対象が単体の時 与えるBRVダメージ中アップ
　-味方全員に自身の攻撃力に依存した量のBRVを加算
・通常「HP攻撃」「HP攻撃＋」が以下の「天罰」に変化
　-4HIT魔法BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃に変化
　-奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
　-ターゲット以外にも20％分のHPダメージ
　-ターゲットブレイク時 ブレイク中攻撃時
